text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Hwehh?! You're a fan of Ryan?! So you just wanted to visit the café…?

text_block_list.name: Black-clad Young Woman
text_block_list.text: I-I'm sorry…

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: N-No, no! I'm sorry for chasing you!! I had you for an evildoer!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: …? But why did you run away then? And why were you watching from so far away instead of going in?

text_block_list.name: Black-clad Young Woman
text_block_list.text: …… Ehh. Ah…… that's…

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: I mean, you like Ryan, don't you? I bet she'd be happier to see you in person!

text_block_list.name: Black-clad Young Woman
text_block_list.text: ………… N-No, umm… I mean, I-I… My clothes are lame, my face is lame, I'm just a suspicious, useless person……

text_block_list.name: Black-clad Young Woman
text_block_list.text: … I'd feel bad making Ryan be nice to me. Really… Some loser like me…

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: ……? What do you mean? If you like her then—

text_block_list.name: Black-clad Young Woman
text_block_list.text: I-I'm so sorry…! Please forgive me. I'm sorry… I'm sorry…!!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Wha—

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: (She ran off, crying. Seeing her face, I…)

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: (I almost felt like I'd become the villain.)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Phew～, there you are! Sorry Biko, I chased after you in a hurry but I had no idea where you went…

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: …… Bono.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: … Ahhh. So that's what happened.

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: … But she's a fan, isn't she? If she likes her… If she wants to come to the café, she can just go in!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Hmm… Maybe it's because she likes her so much that she's scared?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: She likes Ryan a whole lot… So telling Ryan she likes her is scary.

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: B-But, when is she going to tell her then? Nothing's ever going to happen if she keeps being scared…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: … That's why, maybe, she won't ever tell her.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: She probably thinks it'll be much worse if she tells her and ends up being disliked for it.

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Be disliked… for saying she likes her?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Umm let's say, do you dislike dark chocolate, Biko?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: ? Y-Yeah… I think so?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Ehehe…… Riiight?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: I'm sure she doesn't think of her feelings as sweet milk chocolate, but actually reeaaally bitter dark chocolate.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: If she were to give that to her, she'd be rejected because they're too bitter… Something like that. Just the same as this chocolate I made.

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Huuh!? But I think all your chocolate is delicious!?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Well… sorry Biko, that's only because I don't give you the bitter ones. I pick those which won't cause you to have a bad experience.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: … But earlier, when I was trialing new sweets, I happened to make a delicious bit of dark chocolate.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: A slight sweetness spread from within the bitterness. When it was done, you appeared almost immediately.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: I had to rid myself of the thought of wanting to eat them with you in a hurry.

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Huh…?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: I can be so silly sometimes. I knew you wouldn't like the taste and be bothered if I gave it to you.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: That's why I decided to taste-test that chocolate by myself. Because I was also afraid of giving someone a bad memory.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: … Mmm, it really is bitter.

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: … B-But………!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Hey, Biko. Can't you pretend you didn't see her?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: … Do you think you could leave her in peace? And keep it a secret from Ryan?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: …… Umm…

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: (Words won't come out. And why…?)

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: (… Why does Bono's face remind me of her?)

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: (―I thought I would have been able to tell her to try the chocolate together…!)

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: But I couldn't.

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Because if I ate it and really made a disgusted face, I thought Bono would cry.

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: ……… Leave her alone, huh?

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Bikooo! What's wrong?☆ Work's done and your tummy's growling?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Wahh!? Marvelous?! Where did you…?

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Shall we get some choco samples from Akebono? Take a little break?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: ……! N-No. Bono's chocolate isn't…

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: …… Hmm, hm-hmm, hmmmm?

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Ahahahaha☆ Then let's go eat other chocos★ Hurry up-up! Time to go out!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Marvelous?!
